title: League of legend issue after Microsoft update 11/1/2017
body: Alright so a day ago Microsoft sent out an update and so i applied it and i shut down my computer to apply the updates and when i turned it back on the next day I opened the league client and put in my username and password and tried to sign in it did not work it said above the username box. "an unexpected error has occurred while logging in please try again". if issue persists pleas go to the link that had the riot games support. Also when i tried to login again it just sat there authenticating and loading i let it sit for a while and realized it was not going to let me log in after 3 hours.  I searched far and wide to see if i could fix the problem if there was a way to fix I could not find anything that would work. Please fix this don't have any one else endure this.

replies.body: Ok guys all that was wrong is that a internet filter Covenant Eyes had a corrupted file and did not update with the rest of every thing so if you have covenant eyes just call up customer support and uninstall and reinstall the most current version.RESOLVED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
How did you find this out? I do not have anything similar to that porn blocker lol

Well my brother had had the same problem after a Microsoft update they covenant eyes did not update and blocked like every thing . the only reason i thought of it is because it had caused issues in the past

I'm curious if that update might have caused some of your network settings to be refreshed or reset to defaults. Let's check that first off by setting up your port forwarding and dns options again. If you're not sure how to do that, check out those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but definitely let me know if that doesn't help at all!
Non of these methods worked :( any other things i could do or do i just have to leave it up to you guy sand Microsoft to resolve this issue

Thanks man will do this and i will tell you how it turns out thanks. Also if you would not mind would you post the steps you want me to take to trouble shoot i'm not the greatest person with the firewall and network things. with the link for connection guide what do you want me to click on fire wall settings, or release/renew IP and flush DNS. is this what you want me to do there is a video if you scroll down on how to trouble shoot for connection issues. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5
Any luck? I have tried everything I can think of and then some and am still having this issue.

Also another thing if this helps i was looking through the league files to see what may be wrong and the file named league client settings  YAML is almost empty does not have and text or data has like 3 lines of data i looked at my brothers file the league client settings YAML on his computer that has league working and it had like 4 pages of data so that may be the problem as well hope this helps figure out what is wrong
Same thing. Ive spent hours reading forums and watching youtube videos, trying everything suggested and nothing... let me know if the Riot gods come to the rescue
